title: XL 1 bedroom 1.5 bath Penthouse WITH DOORMAN IN MIDTOWN EAST
posting_body: ['Move right in to this extremely private and furnished 1 bedroom 1.5 bath Penthouse.', 'At a sprawling 1,100 feet, there is room to unwind in the grand room that has both a dining and living areas that open up onto a 500 foot wrap-around terrace.', 'The kitchen and both of bathrooms have been renovated.', 'The apartment has plenty of storage with five large closets, including a 5′×5′ walk-in closet in the bedroom.', 'Located in prime Midtown East around the corner from the E, M and 6 trains and next door to the famed ‘Lipstick Building’.', 'A short walking distance to Whole Foods on 57th Street, this is a full service Midtown building with 24 Hour Doorman, Live in Super and Roof Deck.', 'Don’t delay and call me today for a private tour!', "Additionally, I have plenty of units available in Murray Hill, Midtown East , Hell's Kitchen, Gramercy, Upper West Side etc.", 'Including doorman and brownstone buildings with outdoor space, patios, balconies, laundry and more.', "If this isn't your ideal place, let me know", "and I'm certain I can find it!", 'Please call or text for access.', '929-388-9421 arailym']
